mema katayuthu siduwanne wyawastha sanshodhana sammatha karaganima sandaha parlimenthuwe sahaya dinaganimata eksath jathika pakshaya menma demala jathika sandhanaya da ekase katayuthu karamin sitina wathawaranayakaya.wyawastha sampadana katayuthu ha sambandha eksath jathika paksha samajikayaku nithi kshethraye wisharadayin ha sakachcha pawathwa atha.demala jathika sandhanaye nayaka saha wipaksha nayaka aar.sambandhan mahatha hitapu janapathi mahinda rajapaksha mahatha samaga muhunata muhuna hamuwakata sahabhagi wu athara, ehidi sambandhan, eekabaddha wipaksha parlimenthu manthriwarunge sahaya wyawastha sanshodhanaya sammatha karaganimata sadaha labadennayi illa thibe.ese sahaya labadimen eekabaddha wipakshayata da yam yam wasi salasena bawa da ohu penwa di atha.mema sakachchawa sambandhayen danumwath mul pele eekabaddha wipaksha samajikayaku sannde tayims ha adahas dakwamin kiya sitiye mewannaki.
